creator: perutka.ondrej@gmail.com
text:
I'm developing a custom Apache module and I need reference docs for httpd. There are links to it all over the apache.org website, e.g. here:

https://httpd.apache.org/docs/2.4/developer/

Unfortunately, the docs are missing. The http://ci.apache.org/projects/httpd/trunk/doxygen/ endpoint returns 404 and when I check http://ci.apache.org/projects/ there is no httpd at all. Can you, please, tell me where I could find the docs? (and fix the broken links if possible)

creator: toscano.luca@gmail.com
text:
Hi Ondřej,

the http://ci.apache.org/projects/httpd/trunk/doxygen/ link now works, it was due to a failure in https://ci.apache.org/builders/httpd-doxygen-nightly?numbuilds=5000 (it keeps saying failure but only for a minor issue, not affecting the doxygen generation).

I have a patch for the documentation (https://bz.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=58761) that will include links to debug the issue in the future.

Do you think that we could mark this issue as duplicate/solved?

Luca
Marking this issue as fixed as per my last comment. Ondřej please let me know if anything is missing!
creator: toscano.luca@gmail.com
